title: How to be a Productivity Ninja by Graham Allcott
description:
How to be a Productivity Ninja: Worry Less, Achieve More and Love What You Do by Graham Allcott


Graham Allcott presents a new edition of How to be Productivity Ninja, published worldwide in all formats by Icon Books, in January 2014. In this age of information overload, traditional time-management techniques simply arent able to deal with overflowing inboxes, ever-expanding to-do lists and endless, pointless meetings that leave us all feeling panicked and overworked. 

The solution? Think like a Ninja! With techniques from ruthlessness to stealth to mindfulness, you can get your inbox down to zero, make the most of your attention, avoid procrastination and learn to work smarter, not harder. Fun, accessible and practical, How to be a Productivity Ninja teaches you how to stay calm, cool and collected, get more done, and love your work again.

Genre: Non Fiction , Business
